name: Kingfisher plc
membership: British Retail Consortium; CBI (UK); AFEP; FMB (France); Leviatan; Pohid (Poland); APED (Portugal); ADFB (Spain); EDRA; Eurocommerce (EU)
goal:
Kingfisher plc is an international home improvement company with 1,302 stores in 10 countries across Europe, Russia and Turkey, supported by a team of 79,000 colleagues.

Our ambition: We want to create good homes by making home improvement accessible for everyone.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Timber Review; Digital Single Market; Unfair Trading Practices Directive; Internal Single Market - rights of establishment; Interchange Fee Regulations; Circular Economy; Energy efficiency proposals; Jobs agenda - Youth Employment, Older Workers; Consumer interests; Chemicals policy (REACH; Titanium Dioxide; Low Voltage Directive).
